ModMetaData.name: Borderlands: The Rim
ModMetaData.author: Deon
ModMetaData.description:
Adds apparel, weapons and factions from the Borderlands games.

 Release 1.0: Scavs faction with 3 types of helmet, 2 types of armor, 2 types of melee weapon, 4 types of guns and a suicide grenade variation.

SCAV weapons are variants of "machine pistol", "cluster shotgun", "assault rifle" and "sniper rifle", with faster shooting/wind up, slighly higher damage, but noticeably lower accuracy.
